message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. Given its exceptional value, I'm starting with a price of $2000000. I believe it's worth every penny, but I'm open to negotiations if you have a different valuation in mind.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. However, $2000000 is beyond my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1000000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I'm willing to make a concession, but I still believe the product is worth more than your offer. Let me know if we can meet in the middle.

Hi Alice, I understand your position, but $1800000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to increase my offer to $1100000. This is the best I can do while staying within my budget. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to increase your bid. However, I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'm willing to make another concession and meet you closer to the middle. I can offer the product to you for $1500000. If this doesn't work, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $1500000 is still above what I can afford. I'm prepared to offer $1150000, which is my final offer. If this doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider purchasing from another seller. Let me know your thoughts.
